testcase.name: Add a new dvd
testcase.system-out: Given a dvd store...........................................................passed And the following new DVDs..................................................passed And the expected outputs....................................................passed When the new DVDs are added to the store....................................passed Then the get dvd list request should return the expected outputs............passed

testcase.classname: DVD store can remove old DVDs
testcase.name: Remove a dvd
testcase.system-out: Given a dvd store...........................................................passed And the following DVDs in the store.........................................passed And the expected outputs....................................................passed When the dvd with the title "Jurassik Park" is removed......................passed Then the get dvd list request should return the expected outputs............passed

testcase.name: Update a dvd
testcase.system-out: Given a dvd store...........................................................passed And the following DVDs in the store.........................................passed And the expected outputs....................................................passed When I change the title of the film with the id 2 to "Polkadot 2"...........passed Then the get dvd list request should return the expected outputs............passed
